usage.headings: Bitter (Slab Serif) - conveys durability and craftsmanship
usage.body: Inter (Sans Serif) - ensures high legibility for service details

colors.instructions: Override the CSS variables in index.css with these HSL values or Hex codes. Use the 'Off-White' background (#FAF9F6) to avoid a sterile clinical look.

layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Services - Mix tall and wide cards to avoid visual monotony.
layout_strategy.hero_section: Split Screen: Left side text/CTA, Right side 'Chi' portrait with 'Certified Engineer' badge overlay.
layout_strategy.gallery_section: Before/After Slider - Use a draggable slider to reveal the transformation.

cards.style: rounded-xl border border-border/40 bg-card shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.service_card: Must include an icon, title, and short description. Use 'group' hover effects.

navigation.style: Sticky header with glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80). Logo on left, Links center, CTA right.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle wood grain or blueprint patterns in the background of the Hero or Footer to emphasize the 'Engineer/Craftsman' theme.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Hammer', 'Wrench', 'Ruler', 'Paintbrush' for services.
visual_enhancers.animations: Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations. Stagger children in the Services grid.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge

2. THEME SETUP: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors and fonts. Add '@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bitter:wght@300;400;700&family=Inter:wght@300;400;600&display=swap');' to index.css.
3. HERO SECTION: Build a split-screen hero. Left: 'Hi, I'm Chi...' text. Right: The portrait image. Use the 'background_texture' as a subtle overlay or section background.
4. SERVICES GRID: Create a Bento Grid. Don't just list services. Make 'Plumbing' and 'Carpentry' feature cards (larger).
5. GALLERY: Implement a 'Before/After' comparison. If a slider library isn't available, use a simple side-by-side grid with 'Before' and 'After' labels.
6. CONTACT FORM: Use Shadcn 'Form', 'Input', 'Textarea'. Style it to look like a clipboard or a work order form.
7. FOOTER: Dark background (Primary Color). Include 'Certified Mechanical Engineer' badge/text.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast on the Earthy Green background is sufficient (use white text).
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects for the header.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
